summary.span: Define un método para agregar la parte del marcado a un paquete XPS.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of the markup to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la elemento de un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] paquete, consulte el capítulo 9 en la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] especificación, que puede obtener en [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).For more information about the element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).
